Name Rascal/Libraries/Vis/Figure/Properties/lineColor

Function
  1. FProperty lineColor(Color c)
  2. FProperty lineColor(computedColor cc)
  3. FProperty lineColor(str cname)
Description Sets the color of lines and figure boundaries:
  1. Set color to c.
  2. Same, but the color value is computed by callback cc.
  3. Set color to color with name cname.
Also see ColorModel
Examples 
b1 = box([size(50), lineColor("Red")]);
b2 = box([size(50), lineColor("Blue")]);
b3 = box([size(50), lineColor("Green")]);
b4 = box([size(50), lineColor("Purple")]);
boxes = [b1, b2, b3, b4];
render(hcat(boxes));
gives:
